channel.title: Dead-Vengeance
channel.description:
[b][i][center][size=24pt]Dead-Vengeance[/size][/center]
Dead-Vengeance will be the first server I will have ever made, so don't expect too much from me, but im looking for a few people that can help.
[size=18pt][b][i]Coders![/i][/b][/size] Me~Nick
[size=18pt][b][i]Hoster![/b][/size] None-
[size=18pt][b][i]Client Coders![/i][/b][/size] Me~Nick
[size=18pt][b][i]Features![/i][/b][/size]
We will be adding a lot of features such as the following. -Full barrows minigame(not half-assed) -Pure, Main, Magic and Ranged Shops. -Pest Control -Perfect Combat -All Godswords, Saraswords and claws -Pk Rewards shop -Working Specials for all items that have them -0 Retarded customs(only items from real rs) -And A New Home :O
If you are willing to help please fill out applications.
[size=18pt][b][i]Coder Format[/i][/b][/size]
[code]Name: Age: Experience: Time Coding: Useful Info:[/code]
[b][i][size=18pt]Host Format[/size][/i][/b]
[code]Name: Age: Servers Hosted: Proof: Able To Host 24/7: Other Info:[/code]
[b][i][size=18pt]Client Coder Format[/size][/i][/b]
[code]Name: Age: Clients Coded: Experience: Able to Add Models:[/code]

Experience: 2-3 years

Useful Info: check my release out mm i can code and im sure we can talk on msn or something?

-Full barrows minigame(not half-assed)
